snippet: A Marine Corps sniper shown with three other Marines on a YouTube video urinating on the corpses of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan is being reduced in rank after pleading guilty.
abstract: Sgt Robert W Richards, Marine Corps sniper shown with thee other Marines on a YouTube video urinating on the corpses of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan, is being reduced in rank after pleading guilty at a court-martial.
lead_paragraph: A Marine Corps sniper shown with three other Marines on a YouTube video urinating on the corpses of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan is being reduced in rank after pleading guilty.

headline.main: North Carolina: Marine Sentenced in Desecration
